dict.string:
Rob Tsuk, the original designer of Space Dock.
Andrew Parks, Christopher Guild, Quixotic Games and WizKids Games for creating and publishing Star Trek: Attack Wing.
Ex Astris Scientia for the Spacedock artwork used in the application icon.
RiverRatMatt for inspiration in the form of STAW Squad Builder.
Dave DuJour for early testing and feature suggestions.
